title: Programming Methodology
description: This module introduces the concepts of programming and computational problem solving, and teaches basic programming skills with applications to simple problems.

title: Programming Methodology II
description: This module builds on the foundation of CS1101S and introduces students to object-oriented programming and concepts.

title: Data Structures and Algorithms
description: This module teaches students about fundamental data structures and algorithms for efficient computation.

title: Software Engineering
description: This module introduces the necessary concepts and techniques for systematic and rigorous development of software systems.

title: Introduction to Operating Systems
description: This module introduces the basic concepts and mechanisms of operating systems.

title: Introduction to Computational Thinking
description: This module teaches problem-solving through computational thinking and programming basics.

title: Object-Oriented Design & Programming
description: This module covers object-oriented programming concepts and design principles.

title: Advanced Computer Architecture
description: This module covers modern computer architecture, organization, and design.

title: Introduction to Programming
description: This module introduces fundamental programming concepts and problem-solving techniques.

title: Data Management
description: This module covers database design, implementation, and management.
